General.Name: Round Hill Music Royalty Fund LP
General.Description: Round Hill Music Royalty Fund Limited invests in music intellectual property. It owns and operates a portfolio of 51 catalogues of music copyright properties. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Saint Peter Port, the Channel Islands.
General.Address: Dorey Court, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 2HT
